languages.text: {n}Комиссар лишь криво и дерзко ухмыляется вам в лицо. Даже в такой ситуации он умудряется найти что-то забавное.{/n}
{n}The Commissar merely looks you in the eye with a brazen smirk. It seems he is able to find amusement even in a situation like this.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Комиссар лишь криво и дерзко ухмыляется вам в лицо. Даже в такой ситуации он умудряется найти что-то забавное.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Commissar merely looks you in the eye with a brazen smirk. It seems he is able to find amusement even in a situation like this.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: {n}The Commissar merely looks you in the eye with a brazen smirk. It seems he is able to find amusement even in a situation like this.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}政委只是盯着你的双眼，露出了厚颜无耻的笑容。看来，即便是在这样的情况下，他也依然能找到乐子。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar merely looks you in the eye with a brazen smirk. It seems he is able to find amusement even in a situation like this.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}政委只是盯着你的双眼，露出了厚颜无耻的笑容。看来，即便是在这样的情况下，他也依然能找到乐子。{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}コミッサーはふてぶてしい笑みを浮かべてこちらを見つめている。彼はこのような状況でも楽しみを見つけることができるようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar merely looks you in the eye with a brazen smirk. It seems he is able to find amusement even in a situation like this.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーはふてぶてしい笑みを浮かべてこちらを見つめている。彼はこのような状況でも楽しみを見つけることができるようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}El Comisario se limita a mirarte a los ojos con una sonrisa descarada. Parece que incluso esta situación le divierte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar merely looks you in the eye with a brazen smirk. It seems he is able to find amusement even in a situation like this.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El Comisario se limita a mirarte a los ojos con una sonrisa descarada. Parece que incluso esta situación le divierte.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Le commissaire se contente de vous regarder droit dans les yeux avec un sourire effronté. Il semblerait que même dans une situation pareille, cet homme trouve matière à s'amuser.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar merely looks you in the eye with a brazen smirk. It seems he is able to find amusement even in a situation like this.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le commissaire se contente de vous regarder droit dans les yeux avec un sourire effronté. Il semblerait que même dans une situation pareille, cet homme trouve matière à s'amuser.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Der Kommissar sieht dir in die Augen und lächelt unverschämt. Anscheinend findet er selbst in dieser Lage etwas, das ihn amüsiert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar merely looks you in the eye with a brazen smirk. It seems he is able to find amusement even in a situation like this.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kommissar sieht dir in die Augen und lächelt unverschämt. Anscheinend findet er selbst in dieser Lage etwas, das ihn amüsiert.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Komiser, utançtan yoksun bir sırıtışla gözlerinin içine bakıyor. İçinde bulunduğu elim vaziyette dahi eğlenebildiğini görüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar merely looks you in the eye with a brazen smirk. It seems he is able to find amusement even in a situation like this.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Komiser, utançtan yoksun bir sırıtışla gözlerinin içine bakıyor. Görüyorsun ki içinde bulunduğu elim vaziyette dahi eğlenebiliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
